user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill my need for comfort, privacy, and quality in my underwear choices.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a product that would enhance my comfort and privacy compared to my previous choices. The key attributes that attracted me were the specially engineered fabric with cooling channels and the ergonomic design, which promised all-day comfort and ventilation. The positive reviews and the brand's reputation for quality also played a significant role in my decision.

I wanted to try a different style of underwear that would provide better comfort and privacy than my usual options. The soft and breathable fabric, along with the no-ride-up construction and flexibility of the waistband, were important features that influenced my choice. Additionally, the availability of multiple colors and pack options made it appealing.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer comfortable, well-fitting clothing that is versatile for everyday use. I value high-quality materials that provide a good fit and durability, as well as features that enhance comfort, such as breathable fabrics and flexible waistbands. I appreciate products that are easy to care for and maintain their shape after washing. Additionally, I enjoy items that come in a variety of colors and styles, allowing for personal expression while still being practical. On the other hand, I tend to dislike products that lack functionality, such as missing features that could enhance usability, and I am not fond of items that do not offer good value for money or that feel cheap or poorly made.

conversation.content: I want to find underwear that offers both comfort and privacy while maintaining high quality. within my expected price range: [23.98, 25.0]
What specific privacy features are you looking for in the underwear?

I prefer underwear that provides good coverage and a secure fit to ensure privacy. I also like when the design prevents any riding up or adjusting throughout the day. These aspects contribute to my overall comfort and confidence in wearing the underwear.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Hi Panties Pack, Moisture-Wicking High-Cut Brief Underwear (Colors May Vary)> / Item ID: B0BRT5PMTX / Price: $17.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["For the leaner, longer, sexier look you want, try Hanes® high-cut cotton briefs. You'll love the silhouette, styled with hi-cut legs and full-coverage front and back, plus the comfort of no-ride-up leg bands that stay in place. These quality essential panties are made with Hanes® Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks away moisture from your skin to keep you cool and dry all day. This Hanes®-best underwear has a narrow no-pinch logo waistband that's ultra soft for comfort where you need it most. Plus the cotton is preshrunk so the size you buy is the size they stay. These high-cut cotton briefs from Hanes® are available in convenient stock-up 6-packs in assorted colors."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Bali Women's Comfort Revolution Seamless Hi-Cut> / Item ID: B08YXC41MD / Price: $8.66 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['A no-ride-up design, Bali® women’s Comfort Revolution® hi-cut panty is made for the woman on-the-go. Designed with Cool Comfort® moisture-wicking nylon fabric, this women’s panty will keep you comfortable all-day long. The high-cut, seamless panty features a tag-free design that won’t chafe or dig. Narrow leg bands and a knit-in waistband help minimize panty lines for a smooth finish. A classic high-rise design, Bali® seamless women’s underwear offers full front and back coverage so you can move with confidence.'] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Vanity Fair Women's Beyond Comfort Brief Panties> / Item ID: B0B26XMVXS / Price: $12.97 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["Beyond Comfort panties provide the comfort you deserve in three different fabrication options. The Seamless Waistband collection has an extremely soft, seamless waistband that won't dig and provides all day comfort. This panty has a plush microfiber fabric that feels great against your skin. The Silky Stretch collection has silky soft fabric that glides under your clothes and stretches to your individual shape for ultimate comfort. The beautiful, comfort v-front waistband provides a flexible fit that won’t dig. The Modal collection is luxuriously soft and lightweight and was created with sustainably sourced Tencel Modal fabric. This panty provides all over breathability without pinching or digging for all day comfort. All panty silhouettes provide full rear coverage that ensures the panty will stay in place and not ride up and a 100% cotton gusset lining."]
